metadata.title: USN-7030-1 -- py7zr vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that py7zr was vulnerable to path traversal attacks. If a user or automated system were tricked into extracting a specially crafted 7z archive, an attacker could possibly use this issue to write arbitrary files outside the target directory on the host.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7030-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-py7zr-doc - 0.11.3+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1 python3-py7zr - 0.11.3+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
